LightningComponentBundle.description: A modern, SLDS 2 compliant contact card with profile information and CSAT history chart

property.name: themeMode
property.label: Theme Mode
property.description: Choose light or dark theme

property.name: headerBackgroundField
property.label: Background Image Field
property.description: API name of the Contact field containing the header background image URL

property.name: headerBackgroundUrl
property.label: Default Background URL
property.description: Fallback URL for header background if Contact field is empty (leave empty for gradient)

property.name: profileImageField
property.label: Profile Image Field
property.description: API name of the Contact field containing the profile image URL (e.g. ContactCardPicture__c)

property.name: profileImageUrl
property.label: Fallback Image URL (Legacy)
property.description: Fallback URL if Contact field is empty

property.name: fallbackImageUrl
property.label: Fallback Image URL
property.description: URL to use if the Contact field is empty

property.name: healthScoreField
property.label: Health Score Field
property.description: API name of the Contact field containing the health score (e.g. ContactCardHealthScore__c)

property.name: healthScoreLabel
property.label: Health Score Label
property.description: Label to display before the health score value

property.name: healthScoreFallback
property.label: Health Score Fallback
property.description: Fallback value if Contact field is empty

property.name: showHealthScore
property.label: Show Health Score
property.description: Show/hide the health score pill

property.name: tagsField
property.label: Tags Field
property.description: API name of the Contact field containing comma-separated tags

property.name: tags
property.label: Fallback Tags
property.description: Comma-separated tags to display if Contact field is empty (e.g. VIP, Premium)

property.name: showTags
property.label: Show Tags
property.description: Show/hide the tag pills

property.name: voiceCallContactField
property.label: VoiceCall Contact Field
property.description: API name of the Contact lookup field on VoiceCall (e.g. Contact__c). Leave blank if not using on VoiceCall pages.
